name: SHELLPOINT PARTNERS LLC
sampleDescriptions: Continued to track and work on different GSE reform proposals and issues relating to capital requirements for the GSEs with key housing stakeholders.

Worked on issues and options related to non-bank membership in Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) including S.2361 to continue or restore the membership of captive insurance company in the FHLB. Tracking i
